website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, attractive sun shelter that adults can stand up in, but its protection is limited.
pros: A taller, canopy-style sun shelter that is almost as easy to set up as smaller, sit-in dome shelters, with a locking up and drawstring system
Shelters up to 4 adults, who can bring their chairs in with them
cons: Only 1 shade wall, and the shelter must be staked down securely in almost any breeze

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS !
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest piece of design/engineering I've seen since my '02 Mini Cooper. Elegant in it's simplicity. Even a bumbler like myself can set it up and take down in a couple of minutes-solo. Light, easy to carry, and unbelivaby cheap. IMHO much nicer looking than all those ubiquitous little square circus tents. ( OK-I'm an Architect=obsessive ). Buy it even if they double the price !
customer_reviews.author: Terry Barham

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Instant Shade Canopy. I use it at the beach. It's easy to transport and set up. Works great, even in moderate wind.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent it is very easy to assemble and disassemble and lightweight. It fits 5 adults and chairs comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: yaya220

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach shade. Need tie down stakes. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent canopy tent. Easy to put up. Just remember the apparatus that holds the center up sits outside the tent. Once you have that centered and locked it’s all about attaching hooks. 15 minutes top. Has a clip on side to block sun or wind. You will need to by some anchors to hold it down on the beach. I’m actually using it at the campground to shelter my smoker from rain. With the smoke out the side. Side curtain can stop smoke from blowing towards you. So it’s use is quite versatile. Fabric is umbrella like material. So tie downs a must. But for the money. It’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quality with inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camping tool, love this green color. Lightweight and easy pop up/fold. perform well at our beach vacation, provides nice shade. Rain resistant but not heavy rain or strong winds, this may happen to all lightweight camping gear. Anyway, it works well and pretty good quality with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - broke the 2nd time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this canopy to take to our kids sporting events. We used it 2x and it broke. The connectors are plastic. In addition it is difficult to use. You must pull up the bottom piece for it to connect to the top portion and it is not easy, in fact, it resists being pulled up. One of the worst products I have bought. The $40 canopies at other sporting good stores lasted longer than this one. Very disappointed and frustrated...massive waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowwolf

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Easy Set-up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my son. He was very happy with this item, and the ease of setting the canopy up. He also like the unique color, saying that it would be very easy to find on the beach where most canopies are blue in color. This canopy stands out. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Should have believed the bad reviews- SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put up. Center hub was bending as the string was pulled. Finally got it up. Then practiced again, and once again it didn't want to lift. Then legs and ropes tangled and wouldn't work. Finally got it set up again and decided we had to practice again before making idiots of ourselves on the beach. Third time it wouldn't set up at all. SAVE YOUR MONEY!! I can't believe we wasted $85.00 on this. We could have rented beach umbrellas instead. I would return it, but breaking it to pieces to fit it into our trash can was much more satisfying than trying to go through the hassles of a refund.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a solo three night camping trip to the Monterrey area of California. It performance was lacking. Biggest problem was that one leg failed to lock in its extended position. I was able to use it, but luckily there were only light winds during the trip. It was staying open because I was using the guy-lines. I was also unsuccessful to open it as the designer had intended using the cord. I had to manually spread the canopy arms. The potential is there....
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy. Was worried to get a cabana for the beach that would be a hard set up but this was perfect. Came already perfectly assembled and it took me 1 minute to set up. Little low and wished it was taller but who cares I’m going to be sipping coronas sitting in my chair on the beach. Highly recommend this cabana!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tent because I knew I needed something that would be very easy for one person to be able to set up. I shopped around and settled on this one. The only downside is that I have noticed that some of the fabric has very small tears in it but that is because I have been setting it up on concrete. I have now started to lay the piece that is used for the wall on the ground, to provide some protection for the tent while I am setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sun shelter I bought. I like the bright yellow color,easy to carry and pretty light. I couldn't believe that I can set it up just in seconds by myself. It's UV protected and waterproof,there is a wall to avoid direct sun . I can use it on beach or park. It has spacious room and 4 people can be sitted inside. light weight ,easy transport and storage. Great buy with great price.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, durable, quality!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight to carry. Durable fabric. Easy to pop up.... takes about 5 minutes once you’ve done it a couple of times. The sub panel came in handy to block sun. Fits two adults/chairs comfortably... fitting a 3rd is a bit cramped. We definitely enjoyed having this at the beach! Might blow away with strong wind, despite using all 8 pegs, but we took it down before we could find out. I compared it to others I observed on the beach, & I’m glad we had this one!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever!
customer_reviews.text: We were planning a trip to the beach and needed something to provide shade and that could with stand the ocean breeze. This tent was amazing. It was so easy to put up and take down. Stores well. My husband gave me props for such a great buy. My only wish is that is had a bottom but that’s a preference thing.
customer_reviews.author: Texas83

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: The setup of the tent is extremely easy with no assembly needed. It takes no more than 5 minutes, as long as not putting the inner side out as I did at the first attempt. The frame is outside of the tent but not the reverse. The tent is steady enough to skip the drawstrings if If it is not windy. And 14lbs is not a big deal. I can easily carry it with two fishing chairs to walk a long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Floria Tanith

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade with privacy potential.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this canopy as my teardrop camper does not have an awning. I liked that I could order additional side walls. I purchased two additional walls so I can close three sides to have privacy for changing, etc. The awning is easy enough for one person to put up and take down. It fit nicely next to the camper and worked out great as our living room. I would definetly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R De Marco

customer_reviews.title: Tall and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a sun shelter that was extremely light weight to take to the beach. I liked that this one is tall enough to stand under. I put it up by myself with little trouble, although the instructions were not exactly clear and I was unable to play the video. The only thing I would change is the color. It is neon chartreuse. Darker blue or green would have been much easier on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open,fold and carry
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the ease with which this can be opened and folded. Used it in my beach trip and we could setup within 5 mins.Its lightweight and I had no problem walking with for around a mile. It provided all the needed sun protection. Good for a family size of 4 to 6 people
customer_reviews.author: deep

customer_reviews.title: The best one, price and value.
customer_reviews.text: So simple to set up and take down. One person can do it. Let’s say max 3 minutes time to take down and pack it. Love it. It stands secure in the ocean breze/wind. Last time we were in Cocoa Beach in Florida and it was kind of windy but we didn’t have any problems. You can buy longer straps to secure it if it’s windier. But for the winds in Florida was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mede

customer_reviews.title: Keep it if it works !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and took it out on a beach yesterday and found one of the leg doesn't lock into place thus unable to fully stretch the leg. Pros - Lightweight, easy to carry around - SUPER EASY to install (about 3 minutes fully installed). A guy next to me was installing different canopy which took forever to set up. - Able to withstand some wind Cons - Nothing at this moment IF THE PRODUCT ISN'T DEFECTIVE I would be willing to try a replacement item if the seller has available.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Hoon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use works in 15mph winds
customer_reviews.text: I can put this up on my own at the lake without help. Its amazing . So easy and saves us from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: We used yesterday and I am very happy with this product. It is easy yo set up and it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how this works, it's very easy to use. Lightweight and easy to carry through sand. Comes with anchors and it stayed where it was supposed to when we used it. Love the flap that you can move around to block the sun, just wish it was a little bigger, but still an awesome product.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damage, torn in one post area, still attempted to set up, thought tear wasn't that bad, but major difficulties setting up and instructions misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would be as easy to set up as it is in the video, but no joke, it was super easy. The first time it took a little bit to figure out how things are supposed to slide, but after that it was just as easy as they make it look. Stitching quality it good.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wax

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This is a product worth buying! I went out to buy this product for the Labor Day, but it didn't disappoint me. She is very light and easy to set up, very suitable for families with children.

customer_reviews.title: This Sun Shelters Shade is light weight and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This Sun Shelters Shade is light weight and easy to set up and allows me to set-up by myself

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect

customer_reviews.title: Low quality

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot

customer_reviews.title: great value on the beach
customer_reviews.text: great protection from the sun! Love that you can put the back sheet on any side of the tent so as the sun moves during the day, you can hang it on different sides for protection. It is easy to open, but a little more challenging to close. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: senci

customer_reviews.title: Super easy.
customer_reviews.text: This pop up tent is so much easier than a 10x10. Goes up in 8 min or less. Easy to travel with.

customer_reviews.title: Works with less annoyance

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 30 seconds

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the kids to the beach on my own while my husband worked, and the tent was pretty easy to set up by myself. I did purchase additional beach stakes, just to ensure that the tent would be secure in the sand. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great quick canopy

It is plenty spacious ideally can fit 3 camping chairs sitting inside or 4 if you are okay with being closer. The side panel works fabulously and super easy to assemble and disassemble. Once packed away it takes minimal space, great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, bad carrying case
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is fine, but the carrying bag it came in had a bad zipper and we had to use pliers to get it open. The zipper pull broke on the second attempt to close it.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, really well designed, perfect for a day at the beach!

customer_reviews.text: This tent lasted one day in 20 MPH wind. When taking it down it snapped and is no longer usable. Unfortunate bc it was pretty good all day.

product_meta.title: Mobihome Beach Canopy Sun Shelters Shade Tent Pop Up 8.2' X 8.2' - Instant Portable Sports Cabana Umbrella, Easy Set-up and Take Down, with Sun Protection and One Shade Wall Included
feature_bullets: INSTANT QUICK UP CANOPY TENT - Special hub system design for single operation - The fastest and easiest set up and take down; Roll it out, lock your poles, pull the drawstring and QUICK UP the canopy, NO MORE complicated operation!

SPACIOUS & EASY STORAGE - This 8.2' X 8.2' Quick Shade Tent provids a spacious interior shelter that comfortably fits 4 or more people. Packs down to 46 x 6 x 6 inches. Easy to pack up and transport in zippered carry bag wherever you go.

SUN PROTECTION & WATER PROOF - The beach canopy is made from breathable and water-proof polyester material; The sun protection protects user from strong sunlight, and an attachable shadow provides extra sun protection; A large door for easy entranceand and excellent ventilation;

DURABLE CONSTRUCTIONS - High grade powder coating steel frame with strong polyester fabric and telescopic legs offer tents a long-lasting life time; Ideal for sports and outdoor uses such as camping, party, events, and beach activities.

WHAT YOU GET - QUICK UP beach canopy, a carry bag, steel pegs, guy ropes, one detachable flap; Customer friendly 1-year warranty; If you have any questions, welcome to contact our amazing customer service.
